## Tampa International Airport (TPA): An Overview

-   Location: Tampa, Florida
- 23rd Largest Airport in the U.S. 
- 21 million passengers, 459 million pieces of cargo, and 26 million pieces of mail in 2022 
- 60,000 passengers/day
- 550 departing and arriving flights (combined)
-   \>90 destinations

Source: [@FactsStatisticsFinancials]

## TPA Most Popular Destinations
 -   Atlanta, GA
 -   Charlotte, NC
 -   Denver, CO
 -   Chicago, IL
 -   Dallas, TX
 
 Source: [@RITABTSTranstats]
 
## TPA Top Airlines
 
 - Southwest Airlines
 - Delta Air Lines
 - American Airlines
 - United Airlines
 - Spirit Airlines
 - Frontier Airlines
 - JetBlue Airways

Source: [@FactsStatisticsFinancials]
